sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { constructor(private router:Router){} public shopNow(){ if(localStorage.getItem('user')!==null){ this.router.navigate(['/branded']) }else{ this.router.navigate(['/login']) } } }

Your Health, Simplified

Our platform is designed to cater to all your pharmaceutical needs, making the process of ordering medicines online hassle-free and convenient. Rest assured, we only connect you with registered retail pharmacies and certified diagnostic labs, guaranteeing the highest quality and authenticity of the products and services. Our mission is to make healthcare accessible and affordable for everyone, and we strive to simplify the online ordering process, ensuring a seamless experience for our valued customers.
